name: Rotate The Game
description:
This was a game created during the 2020 Mix and Game Jam. We had 48 hours to create a game that mixed game genres. Our game is a mix of classical 2d platforming with puzzle based levels.

3D Modeling/Textures - Activat_ed

Coding - Coca

Logo/Graphics - Activat_ed

Music - Lil Snipez

And special thanks to BOOM for helping us fix our code
